channel.title: Error please help!
channel.description:
I was following this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520563.0.html I compiled after I finished the step before the Npc.cfg part and got these errors.
[code] src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1425: error: orphaned case case 2894: // Spinolyp (ranged) ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1541: error: illegal start of expression public int distanceRequired(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1541: error: ';' expected public int distanceRequired(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1541: error: ';' expected public int distanceRequired(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1581: error: illegal start of expression public int followDistance(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1581: error: ';' expected public int followDistance(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1581: error: ';' expected public int followDistance(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1600: error: illegal start of expression public int getProjectileSpeed(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1600: error: ';' expected public int getProjectileSpeed(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1600: error: ';' expected public int getProjectileSpeed(int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1629: error: illegal start of expression public void attackPlayer(Client c, int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1629: error: illegal start of expression public void attackPlayer(Client c, int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1629: error: ';' expected public void attackPlayer(Client c, int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1629: error: <identifier> expected public void attackPlayer(Client c, int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1629: error: not a statement public void attackPlayer(Client c, int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1629: error: ';' expected public void attackPlayer(Client c, int i) { ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1691: error: illegal start of expression public boolean usingSpecial; ^ src\server\model
pcs\NPCHandler.java:1692: error: illegal start of expression private void handleSpecialNPC(NPC n) { ^ src\server\model

item.title: Error please help!
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

orphaned case means its not inside a switch statement.

Read full topic

item.title: Error please help!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Well you are obviously doing something wrong. Post your NPCHandler class. And if you did download the IDE, then it would tell you what the error is and you could fix it. And if you didn’t know how to fix the error my tutorial would of told you how.

Read full topic

item.title: Error please help!
item.dc:creator: @koomar koomar
item.description:
@koomar wrote:

I downloaded the IDE, read your tutorial and tried multiple times to paste it correctly. No matter what I did, I still came up with the same error…

Read full topic

item.title: Error please help!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Download an IDE (netbeans.org, google it) and then read the tut in my signature so you know how to copy paste correctly. My best bet is that you pasted the code outside of the switch statement.

Read full topic
